A motion was made that this Introduction be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
This Introduction was Introduced by Council

Attachments.Name: July 23, 2019 - Stated Meeting Agenda with Links to Files
Minutes of the Stated Meeting - July 23, 2019
Legislative Documents - Letter to the Mayor

Summary: This bill would co-name 86 thoroughfares and public places, based on requests of Council Members whose district includes the location.  Of these 86 co-names, 9 are either a relocation of a previously enacted co-naming or a revision to the street sign installed with respect to a previously enacted co-naming.
